title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1024/2004 of 26 May 2004 determining the extent to which applications lodged in May 2004 for import licences under the regime provided for by tariff quotas for certain products in the pigmeat sector for the period 1 May 2004 to 30 June 2004 can be accepted
header:
27.5.2004 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 188/12
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1024/2004
of 26 May 2004
determining the extent to which applications lodged in May 2004 for import licences under the regime provided for by tariff quotas for certain products in the pigmeat sector for the period 1 May 2004 to 30 June 2004 can be accepted
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Commission Regulation (EC) No 1458/2003 of 18 August 2003 opening and providing for the administration of tariff quotas for certain products in the pigmeat sector (1) , and in particular Article 5(6) thereof,
Whereas:
main_body: Applications for import licences for the period 1 May to 30 June 2004 submitted pursuant to Regulation (EC) No 1458/2003 shall be met as referred to in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 27 May 2004.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 May 2004.
For the Commission
J. M. SILVA RODRÍGUEZ
Agriculture Director-General
(1)  OJ L 208, 19.8.2003, p. 3.
ANNEX
Group Percentage of acceptance of import licences submitted for the period 1 May to 30 June 2004
G2 100
G3 100
G4 100
G5 100
G6 100
G7 100
